methods.name: create
methods.summary: Add a review, comment, rating, or like.
methods.description:
Requires user login.

See Reviews: Create Review/Comment/Rating/Like for the request parameters supported by this method.

Data is returned in the reviews property of the parameter passed to the callback.

parameters.name: callback
parameters.summary: Callback function to execute when the method completes.
